title: Application
description: A schema for the application definition.

name.description: Specifies the name of the application.

environment.description: Specifies the environment name of the application.

tags.description: Specifies the tags that should be applied to Azure resources.

identity.description: Specifies the identity section of the application.

admin_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the admin group.

developer_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the contributor group.

reader_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the reader group.

service_principal_name.description: Specifies the name of the service principal.

network.description: Specifies the network section of the application.

private_endpoint_subnet.description: Specifies the private endpoint subnet config for the application.

cidr_range.description: Specifies the cidr range of the subnet.

databricks_private_subnet.description: Specifies the databricks private subnet config for the application.

cidr_range.description: Specifies the cidr range of the subnet.

databricks_public_subnet.description: Specifies the databricks public subnet config for the application.

cidr_range.description: Specifies the cidr range of the subnet.

repository.description: Specifies the repository section of the extension.

branch_name.description: Specifies the main git branch name.

data_factory_root_folder.description: Specifies the git root folder for data factory artifacts.

alerting.description: Specifies the alerting section of the application.

categories.description: Specifies the alerting categories for the application.

service_health.description: Specifies the service health alerting configurations.

severity.description: Specifies the severity for the service health alerting configuration.

incident_level.description: Specifies the incident level for the service health alerting configuration.

endpoints.description: Specifies the alerting endpoints for the application.

email.description: Specifies email alerting endpoint config for the application.

email_address.description: Specifies email address to which alerts will be sent.

budget.description: Specifies the budget section of the application.

categories.description: Specifies the budget categories for the application.

endpoints.description: Specifies the budget endpoints for the application.

email.description: Specifies email bduget endpoint config for the application.

email_address.description: Specifies email address to which budget alerts will be sent.

ai_services.description: Specifies the ai services to be deployed for the application.

location.description: Specifies the location of the ai service in case it needs to be deployed in another region for capacity reasons.

kind.description: Specifies the kind of the ai service.

sku.description: Specifies the sku of the ai service.

private_endpoints.description: Specifies the private endpoints to be deployed for the application.

resource_id.description: Specifies the resource id to which the private endpoint should connect.

subresource_name.description: Specifies the subresource name of the private endpoint.

private_dns_zone_id.description: Specifies the private dns zone for the private endpoint.

ai_search.description: Specifies the ai search configuration for the app.

enabled.description: Specifies whether ai search should be enabled.

sku.description: Specifies the sku of the search service.

semantic_search_sku.description: Specifies the semantic search sku of the search service.

partition_count.description: Specifies the partition count of the search service.

replica_count.description: Specifies replica count of the search service.

data_factory.description: Specifies the data factory section of the application.

enabled.description: Specifies whether data factory should be enabled.
